title: Frontend Developer
description:
**Crolit is matching emerging frontend developers with early\\-stage startups and founders building their founding engineering teams.** 
 Instead of endless applications, you create a profile once and get matched with the right opportunities instantly.
 



  





**You might be a fit if you:** 



* Have
 **0–3 years of experience in frontend or web development**
* Are comfortable with
 **modern frontend stacks** 
 (e.g. JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Next.js, Vue, or similar)
* Have built
 **projects,** 
 internships, hackathons, OSS, or personal apps that show real\\-world problem\\-solving and strong UI/UX focus
* Enjoy working in
 **fast\\-paced, founder\\-led teams**



  





**Role details:** 



* **Flexible work:** 
 async and remote\\-first
* **Expected commitment:** 
 10–40 hrs/week (part\\-time or full\\-time)
* **Contract duration:** 
 1–3 months, often with extension or conversion to full\\-time
* **Direct interviews** 
 with startup founders and hiring teams via Crolit



  





**Compensation:** 



* Pay ranges from
 **$15/hr for part\\-time gigs** 
 to
 **$15K–$30K annually for full\\-time roles**



  





**About Crolit** 




 Crolit is an
 **AI\\-powered hiring platform** 
 connecting developers with founders and early\\-stage startups. Our mission is simple:
 **hire smarter, faster, and fairer.** 
 We eliminate outdated processes so developers spend less time applying and more time building.
 



  





 Our early focus is on
 **matching junior and founding frontend engineers with startups** 
 , and we’re expanding to roles across tech, product, and growth as companies scale.

title: Junior Java Developer
description:
**Company Description**

 At Beetroot Consulting, we excel in connecting businesses with top\\-tier talent, ensuring a seamless synergy between exceptional candidates and companies seeking expertise. Our seasoned team specializes in sourcing, screening, and placing skilled professionals across diverse industries, providing flexible staffing solutions to meet modern business needs. With a commitment to precision and excellence, we meticulously assess candidate qualifications, cultural fit, and expertise to ensure optimal matches. At Beetroot Consulting, we don't just fill positions; we forge lasting partnerships, cultivating growth and progress for businesses and individuals alike.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for a Junior Java Developer located in Bengaluru. The Junior Java Developer will be responsible for assisting in the design, development, and maintenance of Java\\-based applications. Day\\-to\\-day tasks involve writing and testing code, debugging programs, and integrating applications with third\\-party web services. The role requires collaboration with senior developers to understand the requirements and develop solutions, as well as participating in code reviews to maintain quality standards.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Java and Programming skills
* Experience with Software Development and Microservices
* Knowledge of the Spring Framework
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work well in a team
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Strong communication skills and attention to detail
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies is a plus
* Any relevant certifications in Java development would be beneficial

title: Frontend Engineer with Full-stack Experience
description:
****Why This Matters****
 Every day, financial professionals waste countless hours on outdated, clunky software. We’re changing that reality, and your code will directly impact how people interact with financial systems worldwide. This isn’t just another tech job – it’s a chance to define the future of an entire industry.
   

  

****Our Promise****
 We’ll give you the freedom to create amazing things, surround you with brilliant minds, and make sure your work has real impact. No bureaucracy, no pointless meetings – just the chance to build something revolutionary while working with some of the smartest people you’ll ever meet.
   

  

 Are you ready to rewrite the rules of finance? Let’s talk.
   

  

****JOIN THE FINANCIAL REVOLUTION!****
 Not Your Average Tech Gig. We’re not just building another app – we’re completely reinventing how financial workflows function in the digital age. We’re pioneering the future of finance, one brilliant feature at a time, by creating technology that transforms how financial professionals work.
   

  

**What You'll Actually Do Here**
* Architect Financial Genios – Transform complex financial nightmares into beautiful, intuitive user experiences that make our customers say "how did we ever live without this?"
* Wield React Like a Superpower – You'll craft lightning\\-fast, pixel\\-perfect interfaces with smooth animations using Framer Motion that make financial data dance.
* Master Data Visualization – Turn boring numbers into compelling visual stories that help users understand complex financial and AI\\-driven insights.
* Own Your Creations – From whiteboard sketches to production deployment, you'll guide features through their entire lifecycle and celebrate when users fall in love with them.
* Shape Our Tech DNA – Your voice matters in every technical decision as we build scalable, responsive standards that will power our growth.
* Bridge Frontend \\& Backend Worlds – Collaborate seamlessly with our Python/ML stack while staying focused on creating exceptional user experiences.


**Who You Are**
****Required Skills (Must Have)****
* Battle\\-Tested Frontend Warrior – 2\\-3 years professional React development experience, preferably in AI/ML or early\\-stage startups
* JavaScript/TypeScript Fluency – Strong expertise in modern JavaScript and TypeScript, with ES6\\+ features and strong typing as part of your craft
* Animation \\& Styling Master – Proficiency with Framer Motion for animations and micro\\-interactions, plus Tailwind CSS for utility\\-first styling
* Data Visualization Maestro – Experience with Chart.js, Recharts, or similar libraries to turn data into compelling visual stories
* State Management Pro – Experience with React Query or similar server state management solutions
* Mobile\\-First Developer – Strong responsive design and mobile\\-first development principles
* Full\\-Stack Aware – Basic Python knowledge (ability to read and understand code) to bridge frontend and backend effectively
* Startup Veteran – Must have previous experience working in early\\-stage startup environments


**Preferred Skills (Nice To Have)**
* AI/ML Startup Background – Direct experience in AI/ML startups or exposure to AI/ML product development
* Real\\-Time Integration – WebSocket integration experience for real\\-time data handling
* Advanced Graphics – Canvas/WebGL graphics experience (Konva, Three.js) for complex visualizations
* Enterprise Tooling – Monorepo experience (Turborepo, Lerna, Nx) and Storybook for component documentation
* State Machine Thinking – Experience with XState or similar state management approaches
* Backend Dabbling – FastAPI or Python web framework knowledge
* Database Basics – Basic MySQL knowledge for data\\-driven applications
* Cloud Experience – AWS services experience (S3, CloudFront)


****Ideal Candidate Profile****
* AI/ML Product Experience – Background building user\\-facing AI features or working with AI/ML workflows and their frontend integration
* Complex Data Specialist – Experience with sophisticated data visualization and real\\-time interfaces
* Startup DNA – Comfortable working in fast\\-paced startup environments where you can make immediate impact
* Technical Product Focus – Previous experience building interfaces for technical or data\\-heavy products
* Problem Solver Extraordinaire – You see impossible UX challenges as your personal playground and can translate complex AI/ML concepts into intuitive user experiences


****Perks****
* Competitive compensation
* Unlimited PTO
* Hybrid working model
* AI Assistants for work (Coding, General Purpose)

title: Software Engineer in Test
description:
Cvent is a leading meetings, events, and hospitality technology provider with more than 4,800 employees and \\~22,000 customers worldwide, including 53% of the Fortune 500\\. Founded in 1999, Cvent delivers a comprehensive event marketing and management platform for marketers and event professionals and offers software solutions to hotels, special event venues, and destinations to help them grow their group/MICE and corporate travel business. Our technology brings millions of people together at events around the world. In short, we’re transforming the meetings and events industry through innovative technology that powers the human connection.
 



  





 The DNA of Cvent is our people, and our culture has an emphasis on fostering intrapreneurship – a system that encourages Cventers to think and act like individual entrepreneurs and empowers them to take action, embrace risk, and make decisions as if they had founded the company themselves. At Cvent, we value the diverse perspectives that each individual brings. Whether working with a team of colleagues or with clients, we ensure that we foster a culture that celebrates differences and builds on shared connections.
 



  





  





 About the role:
 



 Cvent is looking for multiple talented Software Developers in Test II (SDET II) to join our Technology team, which designs, develops and operates large\\-scale, Web\\-based applications and integrated mobile solution. This is a unique full\\-time opportunity for an individual who is seeking new challenges. In this role you will deliver technical solutions to ensure overall quality and integrity of scalable, high performance solutions for transaction\\-intensive web application and micro services. This Quality SDET team position plays an integral role for Sprint teams in providing technical and product feedback at all stages of the development life cycle.
 



  





**What you’ll be doing:** 




  





 Create end\\-to\\-end automated tests for comprehensive test coverage
 



  





 Design, develop, and implement performance and load tests.
 



  





 Troubleshoot and analyze the results of performance/load tests, sharing root causes with team.
 



  





 Improve code coverage of automated tests using code quality tools.
 



  





 Analyze and enhance the coverage of automated security and accessibility tests.
 



  





 Collaborate with Developers and DevOps to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines.
 



  





 Assist in creating test strategy and plans.
 



  





 Provide usability and functional feedback to the product team.
 



  





 Assist sprint teams in raising overall quality and increasing velocity.
 



  





 Participate in Sprint scrum ceremonies, including grooming, planning, and demos.
 



  





 Collaborate with the Automation team to enhance Cvent's testing tools and frameworks.
 



  





 Bring up ideas and contribute to achieving high software quality goals.
 



  





**What you’ll need for the role:** 




  





 Possess a B.E./B.Tech/MCA regular degree from a reputed institute/university
 



  





 Have 2 to 4 years of relevant experience.
 



  





 Minimum of 1 year of hands\\-on experience in web application testing \\& writing automation tests using web automation frameworks like Selenium, Playwright, etc.
 



  





 Possess at least 6 months of hands\\-on experience in API automation testing.
 



  





 Proficiently use developer tools and IDEs, such as Intellij/Eclipse/VSCode and GIT.
 



  





 Demonstrate experience working in a CI/CD environment, like Jenkins, for executing and integrating automated tests.
 



  





 Possess strong troubleshooting and analytical skills for effective technical problem\\-solving.
 



  





 Possess good hands\\-on experience in developing and monitoring performance automated tests (using Gatling, Sitespeed, JMeter, or similar tools).
 



  





**Demonstrate good programming skills, with Java preferred.** 




 Demonstrate proficiency in leveraging AI tools and Generative AI technologies to optimize testing activities, like automation scripting, test data generation, and test case design, etc.
 



  





 Bring working experience with tools/technologies like Junit, TestNG, Jest, Karate, which is a plus

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
Join Our Visionary Team at Pulchritude Fashion!
 



  





 Location: Remote
 



  





 About Pulchritude Fashion:
 



 Pulchritude Fashion is an innovative startup blending fashion, film, and artificial intelligence to create virtual, cinematic fashion experiences. Our platform utilizes digital avatars and advanced video\\-generation technologies to produce immersive, ticketed virtual runway films, enabling audiences to interact with AI\\-driven models and designers.
 



  





 We Are Looking For:
 



 Creative, talented, and ambitious individuals passionate about the intersection of fashion, film, and technology. We invite you to apply if your background aligns with any of the following areas:
 



 • Fashion Design and Styling
 



 • Marketing and Social Media
 



 • Software Engineering and AI Development
 



 • Product Management and Development
 



 • Business Strategy and Operations
 



 • Customer Engagement and Experience
 



 • Film Production and Editing
 



 • Digital Content Creation and Graphic Design
 



 • Public Relations and Communications
 



 • Administrative and Operational Support
 



  





 Key Qualifications:
 



 • Relevant educational or professional experience in your field
 



 • Strong communication and collaboration skills
 



 • Creative problem\\-solving and adaptability
 



 • Passion for innovation and emerging technologies
 



  





 What We Offer:
 



 • An inclusive, diverse, and creative remote work environment
 



 • Opportunities for professional development and growth
 



 • Competitive compensation and performance\\-based incentives
 



 • A collaborative culture that fosters creativity, innovation, and excellence
 



  





 How to Apply:
 



 Submit your resume along with a brief cover letter highlighting your specific area of interest and explaining how your skills and experiences align with Pulchritude Fashion’s unique mission.
 



  





 Pulchritude Fashion is an equal opportunity employer. We actively seek diversity and encourage individuals from all backgrounds to apply, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive.

title: Python Developer
description:
**Job description for Python Developer:**




  





**Experience: 6 – 10 years** 




**Employment:** 
 Full\\-time (Remote)
 



**Location:** 
 Chennai (Remote)
 



**Education:** 
 Any Degree
 



**Notice Period** 
 : Immediate to 15 days
 



  





**About the Role:** 




 We are looking for a Python Developer someone who is passionate about writing clean, high\\-performance code and is excited by data\\-driven applications. The ideal candidate will bring strong expertise in
 **Python, Python 3\\.12 and modern data processing libraries** 
 ,
 **API, Numpy and Pandas,** 
**SQL,** 
 with a proven track record of building and scaling backend systems. This role is perfect for someone who is proactive, quick to learn, and thrives in a fast\\-paced environment.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




 1\\. Design, develop, and maintain backend systems and
 **APIs using Python and FastAPI.** 




 2\\. Work with data\\-centric libraries like
 **pandas, polars, and numpy** 
 to build scalable data pipelines and services.
 



 3\\. Implement and manage asynchronous task scheduling using FastAPI schedulers or similar tools.
 



 4\\. Contribute to architectural decisions and mentor junior developers.
 



 5\\. Participate in code reviews, testing, and good at troubleshooting.
 



 6\\. Work closely with data teams and business stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver effective solutions.
 



 7\\. Continuously learn and adapt to new technologies and best practices.
 



**Must\\-Have Qualifications:** 




 1\\. 6\\-8 years of professional experience with Python.
 



 2\\. Proficient in pandas, polars, and numpy.
 



 3\\. Strong experience building APIs with FastAPI or similar frameworks.
 



 4\\. Hands\\-on experience with task scheduling and background job management.
 



 5\\. Excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills.
 



 6\\. A passion for learning and the ability to pick up new technologies quickly.
 



**Good to Have:** 




**1\\. Excellent English communication (Written and oral)** 




 2\\. Experience with C\\# in enterprise environments.
 



 3\\. Strong knowledge of
 **SQL** 
 and experience with relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, SQL Server).
 



 4\\. Familiarity with Docker, data versioning, job orchestration tools, or cloud platforms

title: Test Engineer(Copado)
description:
**Activities:** 



* Designing and Managing Test Plans: Collaborate closely with developers to design, develop, implement, and manage comprehensive test plans for new projects and software developments.
* Test Case Development: Define, implement, and release test cases derived from requirements, ensuring thorough coverage of all functionalities.
* End\\-to\\-End Testing: Design and execute end\\-to\\-end, regression, UI, and API tests to validate the functionality and performance of our applications.
* API Testing: Perform API testing using tools such as Postman to ensure the reliability and performance of our services.
* Bug Analysis and Documentation: Analyze identified bugs in collaboration with frontend and backend developers, ensuring that all bugs are properly documented, tracked, and acted upon.
* Reviewing Test Results: Review test results, identify issues, and collaborate with developers to address defects promptly.
* Best Practices for Test Automation: Follow best practices for test automation, ensuring the stability and scalability of tests across various environments.
* Cross\\-Functional Collaboration: Work with cross\\-functional teams to define and enhance testing strategies, contributing to overall project success.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Educational Background: Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in software testing and test management, with a strong focus on test automation.
* Certifications: ISTQB Certified Tester Foundation Level or higher is an advantage.
* Test Automation Expertise: Proven experience in test automation using frameworks such as
 **Copado Robotic Testing** 
 .
* CI/CD Tools: Experience with CI/CD tools like
 **Copado** 
 CI/CD and Azure DevOps to facilitate continuous integration and deployment processes.
* API Testing Knowledge: Familiarity with REST API testing and tools such as Postman.
* Understanding of Test Automation Frameworks: Strong understanding of test automation frameworks, selectors, and managing dynamic elements within applications.
* Testing Methods and Techniques: Extensive knowledge of testing methods, techniques, and tools to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
* Adaptability: Flexible and independent working style with an adaptable mindset to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
* Communication Skills: Excellent communication skills, fluent in English; proficiency in German is a plus.



  





**Why Join Us?** 




  





 Be part of a dynamic team that is dedicated to innovation and excellence in the vision care industry. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge projects that have a significant impact on our customers and the industry as a whole. If you are passionate about test automation and looking to grow your career in a collaborative environment, we would love to hear from you!

 At Ryuk Labs, we combine emerging technologies with deep industry expertise to empower users and developers. Our mission is to enable innovation, scalability and engagement across the blockchain ecosystem.

 We are looking for a highly experienced Full Stack Tech Lead to drive the development of scalable, production\\-ready applications. This role demands deep technical expertise across the stack, hands\\-on coding ability and leadership experience in startups or high\\-growth environments. The Tech Lead will not only architect and implement solutions but also mentor engineers, oversee code quality and contribute in projects from ideation to go\\-to\\-market (GTM).
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Lead and mentor a team of full stack developers, guiding architectural decisions and best practices.

* Participate in GTM planning, providing technical insights for product launches and integrations.
* Conduct code reviews, enforce coding standards and ensure maintainability across projects.

* Deep understanding of MongoDB including schema design, query optimisation and indexing strategies.
* Proven experience with JWT/OAuth authentication and secure token management.
* Strong debugging, error handling and performance tuning skills for both frontend and backend.

* Prior startup experience with multi\\-company exposure, delivering production\\-ready products.
* Solid experience with Git, code reviews and collaboration workflows.

* Familiarity with WebSockets for real\\-time features.
* Devops and Containerisation \\& orchestration experience (Docker, Kubernetes).

 The real\\-time AI\\-Meeting co\\-pilot/companion ( built on Agentic\\-Rag framework \\& reinforced with NLP models) participates in online meetings, listens, analyzes, and provides real\\-time contextual prompts, completes actions, does web search, updates CRM, etc on your behalf.
 



  





 Remote / Full\\-Time / Stipend \\- INR 25K\\-50K / 0\\-2 years work ex / BE/BTech/Mtech (final year/graduated)
 



  





 Responsibilities:
 


* Engage in GenAI/NLP projects that incorporate the latest developments in LLMs, RAGs, and AI Agents.
* Research and implement advancements in Prompt engineering, RAGs, Multi\\-Agentic AI, and model fine\\-tuning to create innovative AI solutions.
* Design and build GenAI applications using LLM and AI tools.
* Code, test, and iterate on various product hypotheses utilizing advancements in multimodal AI.
* Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high\\-quality, performant AI software.



  





**Requirements:**

* Hands\\-on experience with RAG, Agents, Evals, and Datasets.
* Familiarity with AI Agent frameworks, such as Langgraph, Crew AI, LangChain, and LamaIndex.
* Knowledge of no\\-code/low\\-code platforms like Replit, Vercel, and Cursor AI.

* STT / TTS (Whisper, Deepgram)

title: Technical Specialist
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 R\\&D Team Lead
   

  

  

  

  

 In this role, you will have the opportunity to initiate and drive technology, software, product, and/or solution development using in\\-depth technical expertise in a specific area. Each day, you will act as the first point of contact in Research and Development (R\\&D) for in\\-depth product or technology\\-related issues. You will also showcase your expertise by supporting strategic corporate technology management and future product/software/solution architecture.
   

  

 The work model for the role is: Hybrid
   

  

 This role is contributing to the Process Automation Business of Process Control Platform Division in Bangalore.
   

  

**You will be mainly accountable for:**
* Distributed Control Systems, Programmable Logic Controllers, SCADA systems, Emergency Shutdown Systems. Experience with ABB systems is preferred.
* Software testing, Defect management system, Azure Devops, Virtual environments (VMware / HyperView / Azure).
* Test Automation, Setting up test environment (both virtual and physical).
* Test case writing, review and reporting.


****Qualifications for the role:****
* The candidate shall have a minimum of 5 years’ experience with the described skill sets.
* Requirement understanding, Preparing test scenarios, test plan and test cases. Automating the test cases.
* Contribute as a domain expert (industrial automation domain) to development. Comply with ABB quality processes. Provide L4 support as necessary.
* Maintain test environment healthy all the time. Participate and contribute in brainstorming sessions on solutions to problems, product enhancements, etc.
* Update the test status in Azure Devops daily.
* Participate and contribute in Sprint, Sprint planning, Sprint demo, Sprint retrospective and lessons learnt meetings. Contribute to product training and documents.


**More About Us:**
 ABB a provides a comprehensive range of integrated automation, electrical and digital systems and services for customers in the process, hybrid and maritime industries. These offerings, coupled with deep domain knowledge in each end market, help to optimize productivity, energy efficiency, sustainability and safety of industrial processes and operations.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Machine Learning & Generative AI Engineer
description:
**Job Description: Machine Learning \\& Generative AI Engineer** 



* **Role:** 
 Machine Learning \\& Generative AI Engineer
* **Job Location:** 
 Bangalore (Hybrid – 2\\-3 days from office)
* **Experience:** 
 3\\-7 years



  





**We value diverse perspectives and encourage applications from women in technology** 




  





**About the Role** 




  





 We are seeking a highly skilled
 **Machine Learning \\& Generative AI Engineer** 
 to design, build, and deploy advanced ML and GenAI solutions. This role provides the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge AI technologies such as
 **LLM fine\\-tuning, Transformer architectures, Retrieval\\-Augmented Generation (RAG)** 
 , and enterprise\\-scale ML systems. The ideal candidate will combine strong technical expertise with innovative thinking to deliver impactful AI solutions aligned with business needs.
 



**Required Skills \\& Qualifications** 




 ·      3–7 years of experience in
 **Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI model development** 




**·      Strong proficiency in Python** 
 and ML frameworks:
 **PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit\\-Learn, MLflow** 




**·      Expertise in Transformer architectures** 
 (BERT, GPT, T5, LLaMA, Falcon, etc.) and
 **attention mechanisms** 




**·      Hands\\-on experience with Generative AI** 
 : LLM fine\\-tuning (LoRA, QLoRA, PEFT, full model tuning), instruction tuning, and
 **prompt optimization** 




**·      Experience with RAG pipelines** 
 – embeddings, vector databases (FAISS, Pinecone, Weaviate, Chroma), and retrieval workflows
 



 ·      Strong foundation in
 **statistics, probability, and optimization techniques** 




**·      Proficiency with cloud ML platforms** 
 (Azure ML / Azure OpenAI, AWS SageMaker / Bedrock, GCP Vertex AI)
 



 ·      Familiarity with
 **Big Data \\& Data Engineering** 
 : Spark, Hadoop, Databricks, SQL/NoSQL databases
 



 ·      Hands\\-on experience with
 **CI/CD, MLOps, and automation pipelines** 
 (Airflow, Kubeflow, MLflow)
 



 ·      Experience with
 **Docker, Kubernetes** 
 for scalable ML/LLM deployment
 



  





**Preferred Qualifications** 




 ·      Experience in
 **NLP \\& Computer Vision** 
 (Transformers, BERT/GPT models, YOLO, OpenCV)
 



 ·      Knowledge of
 **vector search \\& embeddings** 
 for enterprise\\-scale GenAI solutions
 



 ·      Exposure to
 **multimodal AI** 
 (text \\+ image/video/audio) and
 **Edge AI / federated learning** 




**·      Familiarity with RLHF (Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback)** 
 for LLMs
 



 ·      Understanding of
 **real\\-time ML applications** 
 and
 **low\\-latency model serving** 




  





**Key Responsibilities** 




 ·      Design, build, and deploy
 **end\\-to\\-end ML pipelines** 
 including data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and deployment
 



 ·      Develop and optimize
 **LLM\\-based solutions** 
 leveraging Transformer architectures for enterprise applications
 



 ·      Implement
 **RAG pipelines** 
 using embeddings and vector databases to integrate domain\\-specific knowledge into LLMs
 



 ·      Fine\\-tune LLMs on
 **custom datasets** 
 (text corpora, Q\\&A, conversational data, structured\\-to\\-text) for specialized tasks
 



 ·      Ensure
 **scalable deployment** 
 of ML \\& LLM models on cloud environments with monitoring, versioning, and performance optimization
 



 ·      Collaborate with
 **data scientists, domain experts, and software engineers** 
 to deliver AI\\-driven business impact
 



**What We’re Looking For** 




 Beyond technical skills, the ideal candidate should excel in:
 



 ·      Real\\-world AI application \\& deployment
 



 ·      Prompt engineering \\& model evaluation
 



 ·      Fine\\-tuning \\& customization of LLMs
 



 ·      Understanding of LLM internals \\& ecosystem tools
 



 ·      Creativity, problem\\-solving \\& innovation
 



 ·      Business alignment, security, and ethical AI practices
 



  





***Integers.Ai is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.***

We partner with global businesses to modernize their operations, automate workflows, and achieve digital transformation through Microsoft Business Applications.

**Role Overview**

**Key Responsibilities**

**Preferred Skills (Added Advantage)**

**What We Offer**

**Duration \\& Stipend**

title: Prompt Engineer - Generative AI
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 Digital Solution Engineering Manager
   

  

  

  

**Your role and responsibilities**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and dynamic Senior Software Engineer to join our team and lead the development and advancement of ABB Ability™ Genix, with a specific focus on deployment automation, packaging, and Core Technical Capabilities. As a Senior Software Engineer, you will have the opportunity to work directly with a talented team of engineers, driving technology excellence, Agile Delivery Excellence, and fostering People Excellence.
   

  

 This role is contributing to Process Automation business for Process Automation Digital division based in Bangalore Southfield, India
   

  

 Your responsibilities
   

  

**Qualifications for the role**
**More about us**
* Product Development:
* Provide technical leadership, set coding standards, and architectural guidelines.
* Architect and Design (HLD \\& LLD) complex software systems using C\\#, .NET, and Angular.
* Create the WBS for the feature that needs to be incorporated.
* Ensure that the team follows cybersecurity best practices and provide continuous guidance to improve the coding practices
* Ensure the team follows best practices in coding, testing, and debugging.
* Conduct code reviews to maintain code quality and adherence to standards.
* Implement and enforce automated testing and continuous integration practices.
* Identify and address performance bottlenecks in software systems.
* Create and maintain technical documentation, including architecture diagrams and design documents.
* Collaborate with team to plan for product roadmap, demonstrate MVPs and work with product management team on planning and prioritization of features.
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Proven experience (6\\+ years) in a technical leadership, working with software engineering teams.
* Expert knowledge of .NET Core, ASP.NET, Web API, Entity Framework, \\& Angular, including components, directives, services, and routing
* Experience in working with applications involving conversational AI and generative AI is an added advantage
* Experience with Azure cloud computing services, such as Azure App Service, Azure Cosmos, Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), Cognitive Datalake, Azure SQL Server
* Strong knowledge of data structures and algorithms
* Experience with designing \\& developing scalable, microservices\\-based systems with asynchronous programming and design patterns
* Expertise in working in CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, deployment pro\\-cesses
* Ability to design and implement complex, scalable, and secure web \\& Rest API ap\\-plications
* Basic understanding of Kubernetes deployment and pod debugging
* Understanding of Industrial IoT protocols and standards, such as MQTT, OPC UA.
* Experience in mentoring team members and helping them grow professionally. Ex\\-cellent documentation skills and the ability to communicate complex concepts.


 ABB is a leading global technology company that energizes the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. The Process Automation (PA) business area (\\>$6B revenue in 2021, 22,000 employees), automates, electrifies and digitalizes some of the most complex industrial infrastructures on this planet. Through its five divisions, it serves customers in the energy, process and hybrid industries – from hydrocarbons, chemicals, water, mining, minerals, pulp \\& paper to marine and ports, and many more. PA stands at the heart of some of the most important shifts in society, helping the energy\\-intense industries to safer, smarter and more sustainable operations to enable a prosperous, low\\-carbon society
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Senior Full Stack Developer + AI/ML Engineer
description:
**Role Description:** 




 We are looking for a highly skilled Senior Developer with strong AI/ML expertise to lead the next phase of intelligent automation in RadEze PACS, our cloud\\-native radiology workflow platform. You’ll work closely with the founding team to enhance DICOM image handling, integrate diagnostic AI features, and ship high\\-impact features requested by global radiology clients.
 



  





 Location: Noida (Preferred)
 



 Experience: 5–10 years
 



 Company: Ezewok Healthtech Pvt Ltd
 



 Compensation: Competitive with equity potential
 



  





**Requirements:** 



* B.Tech/M.Tech from IIT/NIT/BITS or top\\-tier institutes (preferred)
* 5–10 years of full stack development experience (Node.js \\+ React.js)
* Strong hands\\-on experience with AI/ML:
* PyTorch, TensorFlow, scikit\\-learn
* Image classification, segmentation, NLP
* OpenAI CLIP, Whisper, or HuggingFace models
* Experience in medical imaging (DICOM, PACS, Cornerstone, MONAI, SimpleITK) is a major plus
* Solid understanding of cloud infrastructure (AWS EC2, S3, GPU, Docker, Lambda)
* Comfort with real\\-world product building, debugging, and scaling



  





**Responsibilities:** 




**Full Stack Development** 



* Own and scale our Node.js \\+ React\\-based PACS infrastructure
* Implement new features from diagnostic centers and radiologists
* Optimize performance of DICOM viewer report workflows, and metadata processing
* Enhance real\\-time dashboards, billing engines, and multi\\-user reporting modules



**AI/ML \\& Diagnostic Intelligence** 



* Develop and deploy AI models for radiology use cases:
* X\\-ray/CT/MRI classification.
* Anomaly detection, segmentation, or report summarization
* Integrate dictation and NLP tools for auto\\-reporting
* Build scalable pipelines for image\\-based inference on AWS/GPU\\-backed infrastructure
* Contribute to building our AI assistant for radiologists and coordinators



**Product \\& Client Collaboration** 



* Translate client feature requests into scalable product modules
* Guide implementation of quality and TAT tracking metrics
* Mentor junior developers; work with product and infra leads
* Shape our AI roadmap based on user feedback and imaging standards



  





**Bonus Skills:** 



* Worked on teleradiology, healthcare AI, or FDA/CE\\-regulated medical software
* Experience with multi\\-user workflows, audit trails, and data privacy (HIPAA/GDPR)
* Experience contributing to open\\-source radiology tools.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* Be a foundational member of India’s most flexible, AI\\-enhanced PACS platform
* Lead the AI vision for radiology, working with real\\-world data at scale
* Shape a fast\\-growing product used by radiologists and hospitals across India and abroad
* Remote\\-first, product\\-led, and deeply impact\\-driven culture



  





**To Apply** 




 Send your resume, portfolio, and a brief on your most exciting AI/radiology project to hr@ezewok.com or connect directly with the founders on LinkedIn.
